overview:
Mr. Ammar Afif has 15 years of experience of leading finance and strategy for organizations in the technology sector. Before joining NaviNet, he was chief financial officer of Kantar Media North America, a division of WPP, the largest marketing information services company in the world. At Kantar Media Mr. Afif led the Company evolution into the digital market through a number of acquisitions and strategic partnerships.

Prior to Kantar Media, Mr. Afif was chief financial officer of Pronto Networks, a provider of operation and business support systems software to wireless network providers and funded by DFJ and Intel Capital. At Pronto he led all fundraising activities, finance, legal, human resources and investor relations and was responsible for the Companyâ€™s expansion internationally into Europe and Asia Pacific markets.
